summary: "WALL-E" is a 2008 animated movie by Pixar about a robot named WALL-E, who cleans up Earth in the future. He falls in love with another robot, EVE, and follows her into space. The movie has little dialogue but lots of fun sounds and body language. It teaches lessons about consumerism and the environment. It was a big hit, making over $500 million, and won many awards, including an Oscar. It's now considered one of the best animated films ever and is preserved in the U.S. National Film Registry.
title: WALL-E
